wikipedia_page.main: Roy Hendry Thomson KStJ, DL, MA, MLitt (27 August 1932 – 29 November 2009) was a businessman, public servant and political activist, based in Aberdeen.

response: * Roy Hendry Thomson (1932–2009), Knight of the Order of Saint John, and prominent citizen of Aberdeen, Scotland
